name: XWUI Spoiler Component
description: Collapsible content component with 'show more' toggle. Allows hiding long content behind a collapsed state with smooth expand/collapse animation. Useful for hiding spoilers, long text, or optional content.

conf_comp.title: Component Configuration (conf_comp)
conf_comp.description: Component-specific settings set when initializing the component

maxHeight.description: Maximum height in pixels before showing toggle (when collapsed)

className.description: Additional CSS class name for the spoiler

data.title: Component Data
data.description: Data to update the component, set when initializing the component

content.description: Content element or HTML string to display in the spoiler
